code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt c/o 10 days h/o severe epigastric pain. NKDA. pt is a female geologist aged 52 Ys. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 62 in, Weight 110 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, 24-hour pH monitoring (esophageal) 3.6, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness a:Ulcers p:administered misoprostol - 400 mg daily, performed 24-hour pH monitoring (esophageal), and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:patient presents with severe epigastric pain for about 4 days. patient is a 53 year old white female geologist. o:Height 62 in, Weight 110 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, CBC Hgb=7 g/dL,Hct=25 %, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness a:Ulcers p:administered misoprostol - 400 mg daily, performed CBC, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
